name: v1.4.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Bump actions/setup-go from 3.2.0 to 3.2.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rikatz/kubepug/pull/268
* Bump github/codeql-action from a965b696589ecab4d3bf919c394c73600217deee to 2.1.16 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rikatz/kubepug/pull/267
* Bump sigs.k8s.io/release-utils from 0.7.1 to 0.7.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rikatz/kubepug/pull/265
* Bump github.com/sirupsen/logrus from 1.8.1 to 1.9.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rikatz/kubepug/pull/269
* Bump k8s.io/cli-runtime from 0.24.2 to 0.24.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rikatz/kubepug/pull/261
* Removes the false positives deleted ingresses by @marcelocyreno in https://github.com/rikatz/kubepug/pull/266
* Bump sigs.k8s.io/release-utils from 0.7.2 to 0.7.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rikatz/kubepug/pull/270
* Bump imjasonh/setup-ko from 0.4 to 0.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rikatz/kubepug/pull/272
* Bump github/codeql-action from 2.1.16 to 2.1.18 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rikatz/kubepug/pull/273
* Bump k8s.io/apimachinery from 0.24.3 to 0.24.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rikatz/kubepug/pull/274
* Bump k8s.io/client-go from 0.24.3 to 0.24.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rikatz/kubepug/pull/275
* Bump k8s.io/cli-runtime from 0.24.3 to 0.24.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/rikatz/kubepug/pull/276

## New Contributors
* @marcelocyreno made their first contribution in https://github.com/rikatz/kubepug/pull/266

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rikatz/kubepug/compare/v1.3.4...v1.4.0

name: v1.3.4

name: v1.3.2
body:
In some past moment, not sure why, client-go auth plugins got removed breaking users from cloud providers 🤦‍♂️ 

Now re-adding this library should solve auth problems.

Thanks @mouhsen-ibrahim for reporting this

## What's Changed
* Add missing auth lib of kubernetes by @rikatz in https://github.com/rikatz/kubepug/pull/213


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rikatz/kubepug/compare/v1.3.1...v1.3.2

name: v1.3.1
body:
Adding some missing debugs for better outputing.

## What's Changed
* Add missing error output for better debugging by @rikatz in https://github.com/rikatz/kubepug/pull/212


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rikatz/kubepug/compare/v1.3.0...v1.3.1

name: v1.3.0
body:
Hey 👋 

I've been on an hiatus the past few months, as I've been mostly focused on ingress-nginx :)

But kubepug deserves attention as well, so here I am :)

This new release fixes some old annoying bugs (sorry!!):

## What's Changed
* add golangci-lint dedicated job by @cpanato in https://github.com/rikatz/kubepug/pull/203
* several updates 😅  by @cpanato in https://github.com/rikatz/kubepug/pull/202
* fix group bug by @Letty5411 in https://github.com/rikatz/kubepug/pull/204
* Bump libraries by @rikatz in https://github.com/rikatz/kubepug/pull/208
* Refactor yaml parser and add stdin reading by @rikatz in https://github.com/rikatz/kubepug/pull/209
* Support Kubernetes List type in file input by @rikatz in https://github.com/rikatz/kubepug/pull/210

## New Contributors
* @cpanato made their first contribution in https://github.com/rikatz/kubepug/pull/203
* @Letty5411 made their first contribution in https://github.com/rikatz/kubepug/pull/204

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/rikatz/kubepug/compare/v1.2.2...v1.3.0


Thank you all that helped and keeps helping on this project! I really appreciate that!

name: v1.2.2
body: Adding M1 support and expecting that the release works fine now :)

name: v1.2.1 - Now with M1 support
body: Adding M1 support and expecting that the release works fine now :)

name: v1.1.3
body:
This release adds the following changes:

- [#96] Correct a bug in preferred APIs - Full explanation in the issue #92
- [#98] When using a file input, adds the location also in plain and stdout formatters

Skipping v1.1.1 and v1.1.2 because krew plugin index got some leading spaces and had to rewrite this :/

name: v1.1.2
body:
This release adds the following changes:

- [#96] Correct a bug in preferred APIs - Full explanation in the issue #92
- [#98] When using a file input, adds the location also in plain and stdout formatters

Skipping v1.1.1 because krew plugin index got some leading spaces and had to rewrite this :/

name: v1.1.0
body:
This release contains the following improvements:

* #78 Now support also yaml as input, instead of connecting to a Kubernetes cluster. This can be used with the flag ``input-file`` and support a single file or a directory containing multiple yaml files

* #82 Correct a behavior where when connecting to Kubernetes cluster the preferred API wasn't considered and then non-deprecated objects where still printed

name: v1.0.1
body: Adds the flag --error-on-deprecated and error-on-deleted

name: v1.0.0
body:
This release contains a lot of improvements, most of them thanks to @chentex :)

* Now Pug supports specifying an output format: json, yaml, plain, stdout. Pick your choice. - #48 
* Now Pug supports specifying to write the output into a file - #48 
* Got some log improvements, after all, no one deserves being hit by a panic message - #66 

Thank you all for being using this project :)

name: v0.2.6
body: This is a minor version that updates the Kubernetes libs used by kubepug

name: v0.1.1
body: This release removes the CRDs from walking function, as this doesn't makes sense anyway :)

name: v0.1.0
body:
This is the first beta release

It supports both flows:

* Get all deprecated resources from swagger.json and check if there are any objects from that API in the User Cluster
* Get all objects from the cluster and verify if all of them still exists in future swagger.json

name: v0.0.2
body:
This is the very first  (actually second) attempt.

It works fine but should be tested. Please report any issues :D
So this will work :)

Have fun
